seo.title: RENAPROV - Trusted Microfinance in Cameroon
seo.description: RENAPROV FINANCE SA - Microfinance institution in Cameroon. Accessible financial services, savings, loans, financial inclusion. Become a homeowner with MASO, save with ORA.
seo.keywords: microfinance, Cameroon, savings, credit, financial inclusion, RENAPROV, MASO, ORA, current account, savings account, finance, Yaoundé, Douala

hero.title: Microfinance at the service of populations
hero.description: Since 1996, RENAPROV FINANCE SA has been supporting Cameroonians in their personal and professional projects.
hero.imageAlt: Microfinance at the service of populations

networkProximity.title: A network at the service of proximity
networkProximity.description: Since its creation, RENAPROV has built a dense and strategic network; with branches located in the heart of markets and neighbourhoods. This proximity to our clients allows us to respond quickly to their needs and support them effectively in their daily financial projects.

ariaLabels.img2: Person in dark blue suit with smartphone

institutBissai.title: Bissai University Institute
institutBissai.description: A higher education institution recognised for the quality of its programmes. The Bissai University Institute prepares young people for the jobs of tomorrow through adapted programmes, qualified teaching staff and a focus on innovation.
institutBissai.location: Ekounou Deux Cheveaux, Yaoundé • Socagi 13809, Yaoundé, Cameroon 237

hospitalLaMamu.title: La Mamu Hospital Complex
hospitalLaMamu.description: A modern facility offering accessible, quality care with a human approach and close to patients.

socagi.title: La Socagi
socagi.description: A company specialised in management and investment, La Socagi supports businesses and individuals in their economic projects. Its objective: to promote sustainable growth, secure investments and create long-term value.

royalFm.title: Royal FM
royalFm.description: The listeners' radio in Yaoundé. Royal FM accompanies you with varied programmes, quality information and proximity to its listeners.
